statements: UPDATE social_media_engagement_events SET engagement_metrics = '{"likes": 100, "shares": 50}' WHERE event_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE social_media_engagement_events SET engagement_metrics = '{"likes": 500, "comments": 200}' WHERE event_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE social_media_engagement_events SET social_media_platform = 'Twitter', event_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE event_id = '98765432-1234-5678-9876-543212345678';
UPDATE Social_Media_Users SET followers_count = 5000 WHERE user_id = 101;

UPDATE Social_Media_Events_Engagement SET engagement_count = 200 WHERE event_id = 1001;
UPDATE Social_Media_Users SET profile_bio = 'Software Engineer | Blogger' WHERE user_id = 101;

UPDATE event SET event_location = 'New Location' WHERE event_name = 'Event A';
